history.proof: intros tr. induction tr as [|h t IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - destruct h as [name [e | l]]. + simpl. qsimpl time: 1. + hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Illegal application (Non-functional construction): The expression "IH" of type "import t = import (filterMap trace_non_empty_out t)" cannot be applied to the term "t" : "list (Raft.name * (raft_input + list raft_output))"

original: intros tr. induction tr as [|h t IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - destruct h as [name [e | l]]. + simpl. specialize (IH t). simpl in IH. destruct (trace_non_empty_out e) eqn:H1; simpl; [|apply IH]. destruct e; discriminate. + simpl. specialize (IH t). simpl in IH. destruct (trace_non_empty_out (_, inr l)) eqn:H2; simpl; [|apply IH]. unfold import in IH. rewrite H2. apply IH.
